1.title: Fight for Flight

episode of.title: Kailin Gow's the Crazy Ones (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: From the Wright Brothers to American Airlines and then Southwest Airlines, Kailin Gow explores the innovations and innovators who changed travel, transportation, and social migration today.

2.title: Kailin Gow's the Crazy Ones: Episode 2 - Literature Leads the Way - Part 1: Ancient Books, Timeless Stories

episode of.title: Kailin Gow's the Crazy Ones (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: Literature as innovation is explored in Kailin Gow's The Crazy Ones: Episode 2 - Literature Leads the Way - Part 1: Ancient Books, Timeless Stories. From Arabian Nights, Japan's The Tale of Genjii, China's The Three Kingdoms to England's Tales of King Arthur and Merlin, the rise of literature give rise to innovation and civilization.

3.title: Kailin Gow's the Crazy Ones Episode 3 Literature Leads the Way - Reading & Amazon as Innovator

episode of.title: Kailin Gow's the Crazy Ones (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Kailin Gow's The Crazy Ones Episode 3 - Literature Leads the Way Part 2: Reading for Real People shows literature as innovation while non-traditional publishing has become a $1.25 billion industry in the U.S. as well as Amazon.com as an innovator.

imdb.plot outline: Who are "The Crazy Ones", a phrase used by the late Steven Jobs, to describe innovators who changed the world? Host Kailin Gow introduces the innovations and innovators across technology, literature, politics, science, entertainment, and more in Kailin Gow's The Crazy Ones to break down the innovation and its impact on the world.
imdb.title: Kailin Gow's the Crazy Ones
akas: Kailin Gow's the Crazy Ones (United States)
plot: Who are "The Crazy Ones", a phrase used by the late Steven Jobs, to describe innovators who changed the world? Host Kailin Gow introduces the innovations and innovators across technology, literature, politics, science, entertainment, and more in Kailin Gow's The Crazy Ones to break down the innovation and its impact on the world.::Kimberly
